item.title: 最新消息：费城SEPTA公交车站周三下午发生大规模枪击事件，当局称至少有七人受伤。
item.description:
BREAKING: At least seven people were injured in a mass shooting at a SEPTA bus stop in Philadelphia on Wednesday afternoon, authorities said.

The victims are believed to be juveniles, and their conditions are not clear, police said. https://t.co/ILp1vB9FoE pic.twitter.com/IrwAe75zx0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在 "超级星期二"，乔-拜登总统出人意料地在美属萨摩亚民主党党团会议上输给了企业家杰森-帕尔默。美国广播公司新闻采访了他：
item.description:
In a surprising upset on Super Tuesday, President Joe Biden lost the American Samoa Democratic caucuses to entrepreneur Jason Palmer.

So who is Jason Palmer?

item.title: 检察官告诉陪审员，《锈迹斑斑》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）的疏忽导致了摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）的死亡，而辩方则在古铁雷斯非故意过失杀人案的结案陈词中反驳说，古铁雷斯是一只 "替罪羊"。
item.description:
Prosecutors told jurors that "Rust" armorer Hannah Gutierrez's negligence led to the death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins, while the defense countered that Gutierrez is a "scapegoat" during closing arguments in her involuntary manslaughter trial. https://t.co/35pdOodjCN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 越来越多具有气候意识的欧洲人选择放弃飞行，转而乘坐长途火车。

item.title: 据内华达州野生动物官员称，一只稀有的黄嘴泥鳅暂时关闭了拉斯维加斯贝拉吉欧酒店著名的喷泉表演，目前已被救出并重新安置到一个 "更合适 "的地点。
item.description:
A rare yellow-billed loon that temporarily shut down the famous fountain show at the Bellagio in Las Vegas has been rescued and relocated to a "more suitable" location, according to wildlife officials in Nevada. https://t.co/nP6pzET4TV pic.twitter.com/I6U6BRg6nk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 海地正处于危机之中，上周帮派暴力事件激增--这可能只是一个开始，越来越多的海地专家将其称为反对该国现任政府的叛乱。
item.description:
Haiti is in the midst of a crisis that has seen an explosion of gang violence in the last week — and it could be just the beginning of what an increasing number of Haiti experts are referring to as a rebellion against the country's sitting government. https://t.co/P4tt9h0ksA

item.title: 周二有六人被捕，他们涉嫌从中国走私数千磅生鹅肠和鸭肠，途经洛杉矶，最终运到纽约市销售给餐馆和消费者。
item.description:
Six people were arrested Tuesday in connection with a scheme to smuggle thousands of pounds of raw goose and duck intestines from China, through Los Angeles, and ultimately to New York City for sale to restaurants and consumers. https://t.co/dmEACgyerK pic.twitter.com/xQrWit4RZp

item.title: 最新消息明尼苏达州众议员迪恩-菲利普斯（Dean Phillips）将结束他在民主党初选中对拜登总统的长期挑战，因为他所传达的 "民主党需要一个更年轻的提名人 "的信息未能在选民中赢得任何明显的吸引力。
item.description:
JUST IN: Minnesota Rep. Dean Phillips is ending his long shot challenge to Pres. Biden in the Democratic primary, having failed to win any notable traction among voters with his message that the party needs a younger nominee. https://t.co/PWVsrM7X5O pic.twitter.com/cDa12yiVS3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 丹麦女王玛格丽特今年早些时候宣布退位，令其国家大吃一惊，她的一幅抽象画在哥本哈根拍卖会上以 23,300 美元的价格售出，超过了 11,000-14,550 美元的估价。
item.description:
An abstract painting by Denmark's Queen Margrethe, who surprised her country by abdicating earlier this year, has been sold at a Copenhagen auction at $23,300 — exceeding the estimated price of $11,000-14,550. https://t.co/OI8KBFckJu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
item.description:
Several coastal cities around the United States are "disappearing" into the ground, according to new research — which could further exacerbate complications of sea level rise in the near future. https://t.co/KluKw8Sfz8 pic.twitter.com/Bj5Prfzcfd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 联合国移民机构称，去年全球至少有8565名移民死于陆路和海路，这是该机构十年前开始统计死亡人数以来的最高纪录。
item.description:
At least 8,565 migrants died on land and sea routes worldwide last year, the U.N. migration agency says — a record high since it began tallying deaths a decade ago. https://t.co/78xyOI64Ej

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据周三发表在《自然》杂志上的研究报告称，在乌克兰发现的古代石器可能是欧洲早期人类存在的最古老证据。

item.title: 丹麦女王玛格丽特今年早些时候宣布退位，令她的国家大吃一惊。她的一幅抽象画在哥本哈根拍卖会上以 23,300 美元的价格售出，超过了约 11,000 美元的估价。
